text: Isolates the current Geo Container for rendering via the Octane Quick Setup

When using the Octane Quick Setup, this tool allows the isolation of the currently Geo Context for rendering.  It is important to understand that any objects/lights outside of the selected Geo context are disabled.
The Isolation can be disabled via the Disable Isolation tool.

title: Enable Octane Isolation
summary: Isolates the current Geo Container for rendering via the Octane Quick Setup
